SEARCH_PATH.desc: Where GSD looks when loading libraries
SEARCH_PATH.details: This is like perl5's @INC. Can be string paths, or subroutines

LOADED_LIBS.details: Like perl5's %INC, however this is more used for thread synchronization when loading libraries.

undef.details: There is only one instance of the 'Undef' type, this is it. Usng 'Undef' as a constructor simply returns this object

stderr.desc: IO Object repesenting the stderr handle
usage: stderr.print 'Some Message' // Newline is automatically added with print
stderr 'Some Message' // Calling stderr as a subroutine calls stderr.print

stdin.desc: IO Object repesenting the stdin handle

stdout.desc: IO Object repesenting the stdin handle
usage: stdout.print 'Some Message' // Newline is automatically added with print
stdout 'Some Message' // Calling stdout as a subroutine calls stdout.print
